front.title: IGP Flexible Algorithms (Flex-Algorithm) In IP Networks

abstract.t: An IGP Flexible Algorithm (Flex-Algorithm) allows IGPs to compute constraint-based paths. The base IGP Flex-Algorithm specification describes how it is used with Segment Routing (SR) data planes - SR MPLS and SRv6.
This document extends IGP Flex-Algorithm, so that it can be used with regular IPv4 and IPv6 forwarding.
